comment.author: 35603348@N03
comment._content: I am pretty sure this is not the suspension bridge at Kangaroo Valley but the one that spans the Nepean River at Maldon, NSW. It still stands but is no longer open to traffic.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: Thanks [http://www.flickr.com/photos/highplains68] you're right this isn't the bridge at Kangaroo Valley. Have a look at this document from North Sydeny Council. The bridge is the suspension bridge in Cammeray: www.northsydney.nsw.gov.au/resources/documents/13_suspens... -AG

comment.author: 35603348@N03
comment._content: Blimey you're right, fascinating outcome. btw keep posting these photos, there's some absolute gems amongst them!
